trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> objects that are the rows of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> que são as linhas de um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection> class represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> objects for an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection> classe representa uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> objetos para um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> controle.

trans-unit.source: Controls can be added at the end of the collection with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.Add%2A> method, or at a specified index location in the collection with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Controles podem ser adicionados ao final da coleção com o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.Add%2A> método, ou em um local de índice especificado na coleção com o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.AddAt%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Only controls of type <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> can be added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Somente controles do tipo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> podem ser adicionados para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection> that overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.Add%2A> method so that when rows are added to a table, they are always added at the beginning of the table's row collection.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection> que substitui o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.Add%2A> método para que quando linhas são adicionadas a uma tabela, elas sempre sejam adicionadas no início da coleção de linhas da tabela.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> a adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> especificado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The added control can only be an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> control; otherwise, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: O controle adicionado só pode ser um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> controle; caso contrário, um <xref:System.ArgumentException> exceção será lançada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection> collection that overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.Add%2A> method so that when rows are added to a table, they are always added at the beginning of the table's row collection.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection> coleção que substitui o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.Add%2A> método para que quando linhas são adicionadas a uma tabela, elas sempre sejam adicionadas no início da coleção de linhas da tabela.

trans-unit.source: Notice how the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.Add%2A> method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.AddAt%2A> method with the `index` parameter equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: Observe como personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.Add%2A> chamadas de método da classe base <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.AddAt%2A> método com o `index` parâmetro igual a 0.

trans-unit.source: The added control must be of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" />.
trans-unit.target: O controle adicionado deve ser do tipo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" />.

trans-unit.source: The location in the array at which to add the child control.
trans-unit.target: O local na matriz à qual você deseja adicionar o controle filho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> a adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> especificado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The new control is added to the array at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: O novo controle é adicionado à matriz na localização do índice especificada.

trans-unit.source: The added control can only be an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> control; otherwise, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: O controle adicionado só pode ser um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> controle; caso contrário, um <xref:System.ArgumentException> é gerada.

trans-unit.source: The added control must be of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" />.
trans-unit.target: O controle adicionado deve ser do tipo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" />.
